steps.description: Craft the concept paper for your event/activity.
Once approved, you may proceed with booking your desired venue.
steps.assetsText: Channels may vary depending on your chosen venue:

assetsFacilities.label: Bapa Benny Tudtud Auditorium Conference Room A - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Conference Room B - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Conference Room C1 - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Conference Room C2 - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Conference Room D - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Conference Room E - Ricci Hall, 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Pakighinabi, Ricci Hall - 3rd Floor, CCFC Building
Training Room - Xavier Hall, 8th Floor, CCFC Building
Media Room - Xavier Hall, 8th Floor, CCFC Building
Arrupe Hall Front Area - Arrupe Hall Martin Building
L300 Van | LHE-238
nestedInstructions: Fill out the information required on the website. For a heads-up, the website requires you to attach your (1) approved concept paper, (2) proof of approval for the rental fee waiver (if you have emailed the Executive Vice President to request waiving of the fee), and (3) floor plan and program flow if applicable.
After filling out the necessary information, an email will be sent to you confirming your request for booking.
Wait for the approval of the approvers before proceeding.
Once the ending approver has approved, you have successfully and officially booked the venue!

physicalPlantOffice.label: Classrooms
nestedInstructions: First, go to the registrar's office and inquire what are the available rooms at the time of your activity. After the confirmation, you will be directed to go to the Physical Plant Office to request a form that you need to complete.

suzanDoromal.label: Martin Hall (4th, 6th, 7th Floor)
nestedInstructions: First, proceed to the Athletics Office located at the back of the 4th Floor, Martin Hall, and inquire for the availability of the venue. Obtain a copy of the Martin Hall reservation form.

libraryFacilities.label: Audio-visual Room
nestedInstructions: Corresponding steps and guidelines are elucidated on the website.

icommpEquipment.title: ICOMMP EQUIPMENT AND STUDIOS BOOKING
icommpEquipment.mainText: Access the link if you intend to book the following equipment and/or studios:

content.details: The studio also offers DSLR, Tripod, and Lights upon your request.
The studio also offers DSLR, Tripod, and Lights upon your request.

content.item: LED Wall 1 (Big) (Only at Martin Hall 4th Floor)
Tech Help or Zoom / Live Stream / Camera Setup 1 & Other Equipment
Tech Help or Zoom / Live Stream / Camera Setup 2 & Other Equipment

requestDocuments.title: REQUEST FOR OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS
requestDocuments.mainText:
The form caters to both current students and alumni. The students and alumni should fill this out in order to request documents and for drive-through payment and claim of the requested document(s).

Access the link if you intend to request for any of the following documents: Transcript of Records (TOR) for Board Exam (Please upload 2x2 picture) -- Required for licensure examinations.

content.details: A certified replica of your diploma.
(Issued only once and Subject to verification).
May be denied release for cause. Affidavits of explanation justifying the request must be sent as part of your response to the confirmation email which you will receive subsequently.

content.item: Reissued LLB to Juris Doctor Diploma
content.details: A replacement or re-issuance of LLB your diploma, per LLB circular.
Only one copy allowed for release (issued only once). This is requested as part of the credentials for students/graduates who desire to transfer to other schools.

content.item: Certification, Authentication, and Verification from (CAV) CHED (Local)
Certification, Authentication, and Verification (CAV) from CHED (Abroad) / DFA

content.details: Certifies the period of attendance of the requesting party as an incumbent student of their specific program.
Specify school year and semester in the details.
Please indicate in the details the school year, semester, and number of copies.
Certifies the details relative to the grant of the degree by a graduate.
Indicates that the medium of instruction by the University is English, unless otherwise required by law.
(Processing time: 2 weeks. Please specify in the details if requesting specific courses (subjects) or all)

content.item: Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency Documents
content.details: 2 CTC Diploma, Original TOR abroad with 2 authentications, 2 Letter of Confirmation, Autonomous Certificate (cert. of fee), Certificate of AHPRA, 1 long brown envelope.

details.mainText: Access the link to request the said document. Please note that the form is only intended for the utilization of the Undergraduate Unit.
